pages.text: $(li)Blaze are floating hostile creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/fortress)Nether Fortresses$(/l) of the Nether.$(br)$(li)They throw you fireballs, if one of these hits you, it will burns you, inflincting an extra damage for a few seconds.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/blaze_rod)Blaze Rods$(/l) on death.
